title: More lag than usual
body: I've been getting way more lag in the last week or so than I have ever gotten before. Usually I have high ping, but steady game play. Lately its been packet loss, and lag spikes and ping spikes constantly. I've tried all the usual fixes. Is it anyone else or just on my end?

replies.body: An unusual change like this could indicate an issue with how your ISP is routing to us with bumps along the way.  See if [configuring your DNS](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) can help change that routing and find a faster route.  Test it in a custom and let me know if it helps.
DId you check your cables, splitters, line in (from transformer to house, that line in) and if it could be the weather affecting it?
